sqlGroup.sql: from( select t1.id,t1.fill,t1.ly_id,t1.`type`,t2.`name` etalon,t3.price,t4.`name` brand,t5.`name` model from ( select id,e_id,ly_id,fill,`type` from oil_product where 1=1 <% if(!isEmpty(lyid)){ %> AND ly_id = #'$lyid$'# <% } %> <% if(!isEmpty(type)){ %> AND `type` = #$type$# <% } %> <% if(!isEmpty(etalon)){ %> AND e_id = #$etalon$# <% } %> )t1 JOIN oil_etalon t2 on t1.e_id = t2.id <% if(!isEmpty(etalon)){ %> AND t2.id = #$etalon$# <% } %> JOIN oil_price t3 on t3.e_id=t1.e_id and t3.`type`=t1.`type` and t3.e_id=t2.id <% if(!isEmpty(etalon)){ %> AND t3.e_id = #$etalon$# <% } %> <% if(!isEmpty(brand)){ %> AND t3.b_id = #$brand$# <% } %> JOIN oil_brand t4 ON t3.b_id = t4.id <% if(!isEmpty(brand)){ %> AND t4.id = #$brand$# <% } %> JOIN oil_model t5 ON t5.id = t3.m_id and t5.b_id=t4.id <% if(!isEmpty(model)){ %> AND t5.id = #$model$# <% } %> )t
